Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 69th/Dan Ryan
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at 69th/Dan Ryan due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at 69th/Dan Ryan due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
